name: Atelier Lulua: Lulua's Outfit "Innocent Fairy"
detailed_description:
Early Purchase Bonus (until June 20, 2019)

An additional outfit for Lulua.

Note:These items are available during the period from May 21st, 2019 - June 20th, 2019.
Please beware that after the aforementioned period the content will not be available for download, regardless of the purchase date.
Items released as bonus content may be sold separately at a later day.

short_description: Early Purchase Bonus (until June 20, 2019) An additional outfit for Lulua.

fullgame.name: Atelier Lulua ~The Scion of Arland~ / ルルアのアトリエ ～アーランドの錬金術士４～

supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5 2.6GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660 or better, Graphic Memory 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7 3.4GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or better, Graphic memory 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
